component.name: createAppointment
component.description: Create a new appointment in Cliniko account using the provided Parameters.

component.name: updateAppointment
component.description: Update details of the appointment identified by the provided appointment ID.

component.name: getAppointment
component.description: Retrieve details of a appointment identified by the provided appointment ID.

component.name: listAppointments
component.description: Retrieve a list of appointments from Cliniko account.

component.name: listCancelledAppointments
component.description: Retrieve a list of cancelled appointments from Cliniko account.
